CGForceFieldParameters module

CGForceFieldParameters Module

Coarse-Grained Force Field Parameter Initialization Module

This module contains the classes and functions used for initializing Coarse-Grained (CG) force field parameters based on mappings from Fine-Grained (FG) simulations. The primary class, InitCGForceFieldParameters, facilitates the creation of CG models by calculating various force field parameters such as Lennard-Jones (LJ) parameters, bond parameters, angle parameters, and dihedral parameters.

The module also provides functions to generate system topology and main function demonstrations.

Classes

class CGForceFieldParameters.InitCGForceFieldParameters(mapping_item, num_mols, setbond=True, setangle=True, setdihedral=False, set_ring_constraint=False)

Initializes and calculates the Coarse-Grained (CG) force field parameters based on the mapping from a Fine-Grained (FG) simulation.

This class processes the mapping from FG to CG representation and calculates necessary force field parameters including Lennard-Jones (LJ) parameters, bond lengths and strengths, angle and dihedral parameters. It supports setting ring constraints and customizing the force field parameter calculation for different CG models.

Parameters:

  • mapping_item (object) – An object containing the mapping information from FG to CG representation.

  • num_mols (int) – Number of molecules in the system.

  • setbond (bool, optional) – Flag to enable calculation of bond parameters. Default is True.

  • setangle (bool, optional) – Flag to enable calculation of angle parameters. Default is True.

  • setdihedral (bool, optional) – Flag to enable calculation of dihedral parameters. Default is False.

  • set_ring_constraint (bool, optional) – Flag to enable setting ring constraints in the CG model. Default is False.

mapping_item

Stores the provided mapping information.

Type:

object

mol_name

Name of the molecule.

Type:

str

cg_model

Coarse-Grained model name.

Type:

str

num_mols

Number of molecules.

Type:

int

bond_parameters

Dictionary storing bond parameters.

Type:

dict

angle_parameters

Dictionary storing angle parameters.

Type:

dict

dihedral_parameters

Dictionary storing dihedral parameters.

Type:

dict

lj_parameters

Dictionary storing Lennard-Jones parameters, initialized upon calling init_lj_parameters.

Type:

dict, optional

add_fg_groups(fg_groups)

Assigns Fine-Grained groups to Coarse-Grained beads.

init_lj_parameters()

Initializes the Lennard-Jones parameters based on CG model.

Initializes bond parameters for the CG model.

Initializes angle parameters for the CG model.

Initializes dihedral parameters for the CG model.

set_bond_parameters(traj, top, res_name, num_mol, num_atom_with_H, bond=None, group_list=None)

Sets the bond parameters for the CG model using simulation data.

Sets the angle parameters for the CG model using simulation data.

set_dihedral_parameters(traj, top, res_name, num_mol, num_atom_with_H, dihedral=None, group_list=None)

Sets the dihedral parameters for the CG model using simulation data.

set_bond_constraint(atom1, atom2, constraint_length, constraint_type=1)

Sets a bond constraint between two atoms.

add_fg_groups(fg_groups)

Assigns Fine-Grained (FG) groups to Coarse-Grained (CG) beads.

Parameters:

fg_groups (list) – A list of FG groups to be assigned to CG beads.

generate_cg_ff_parameters_item()

Generates the complete set of CG force field parameters.

This method compiles all calculated parameters into a dictionary for easy access and manipulation.

Returns:

A dictionary containing all CG force field parameters.

Return type:

dict

init_angle_parameters()

Initializes the angle parameters for the CG model.

This method calculates the equilibrium angles and their force constants for all angle terms defined in the CG model.

init_bond_parameters()

Initializes the bond parameters for the CG model.

This method computes the bond lengths and force constants for all bonds defined in the CG model.

init_dihedral_parameters()

Initializes the dihedral parameters for the CG model.

This method computes the parameters for dihedral angles, including the phase, multiplicity, and force constants.

init_lj_parameters()

Initializes the Lennard-Jones (LJ) parameters for the CG model.

This method calculates the LJ parameters based on the types of CG particles defined in the mapping information.

set_angle_parameters(traj, top, res_name, num_mol, num_atom_with_H, angle=None, group_list=None)

Sets the angle parameters using simulation data.

Parameters are similar to set_bond_parameters method.

set_bond_constraint(atom1, atom2, constraint_length, constraint_type=1)

Sets a bond constraint between two atoms.

Parameters:

  • atom1 (int) – ID of the first atom.

  • atom2 (int) – ID of the second atom.

  • constraint_length (float) – Length of the constraint.

  • constraint_type (int, optional) – Type of the constraint. Default is 1.

Returns:

A dictionary with the bond constraint parameters.

Return type:

dict

set_bond_parameters(traj, top, res_name, num_mol, num_atom_with_H, bond=None, group_list=None)

Sets the bond parameters using simulation data.

Parameters:

  • traj (str) – Path to the trajectory file.

  • top (str) – Path to the topology file.

  • res_name (str) – Name of the residue.

  • num_mol (int) – Number of molecules.

  • num_atom_with_H (int) – Number of atoms with hydrogen.

  • bond (tuple, optional) – Specific bond for which parameters are set. Default is None.

  • group_list (list, optional) – List of groups to consider. Default is None.

set_dihedral_parameters(traj, top, res_name, num_mol, num_atom_with_H, dihedral=None, group_list=None)

Sets the dihedral parameters using simulation data.

Parameters are similar to set_bond_parameters method.

Functions

CGForceFieldParameters.generate_system_top(mols, num_mols=None)

Generates the system topology for a Coarse-Grained model.

Parameters:

  • mols (list of dicts) – List of molecule information dictionaries.

  • num_mols (list of int, optional) – List specifying the number of each molecule type.

Returns:

A dictionary representing the system topology, including molecules and Lennard-Jones cross terms.

Return type:

dict
